350. Removed MPI-1 Constants


Up: Removed MPI-1 Bindings Next: Removed MPI-1 Callback Prototypes Previous: Removed MPI-1 Datatypes

Table 18 shows the removed MPI-1 constants. There are no MPI-2 replacements.

Removed MPI-1 Constants
C type: const int (or unnamed enum)
Fortran type: INTEGER
MPI_COMBINER_HINDEXED_INTEGER
MPI_COMBINER_HVECTOR_INTEGER
MPI_COMBINER_STRUCT_INTEGER
